text: Margareta Ann-Christine Bärnsten, born 10 July 1957, is a Swedish singer and writer. She has written several detective stories. As a singer, she participated at Melodifestivalen 1975 with the song Ska vi plocka körsbär i min trädgård. The song ended up 5th. ==Svensktoppen hit songs== *"Ska vi plocka körsbär i min trädgård" – 1975Svensktoppen - 1975, accessdate: 20 September 2012 ==Bibliography== *Döden är en schlager - 2005 *Gröna villan - 2007 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers Category:Swedish writers
title: Ann-Christine Bärnsten
